@pytest.mark.ui
    @pytest.mark.regression
    def test_login():
        with sync_playwright() as p:
            # Launch the browser in headless mode based on the environment variable
            browser = p.chromium.launch(headless=os.getenv("HEADLESS", "true").lower() == "true")
            page = browser.new_page()
    
            # Initialize the LoginPage object
            login_page = LoginPage(page)
    
            # Retrieve the login URL, username, and password from environment variables
            login_url = os.getenv("LOGIN_URL")
            username = os.getenv("LOGIN_USERNAME", "testuser")
            password = os.getenv("LOGIN_PASSWORD", "securepassword")
    
            # Validate that login_url is set
            assert login_url is not None, "LOGIN_URL is not set in environment variables."
    
            # Navigate to the login page and perform the login
            login_page.navigate_to_login_page(login_url)
